item.title: 特斯拉和亚马逊扭曲了消费者的健康预测
item.description:
从自由裁量权指数中剔除两位 "神童"，随着劳动力市场的降温，经济前景将变得不那么强劲。【原文：

Take the two Magnificents out of the discretionary index, and the outlook is less robust as the labor market cools.

】

item.title: 种植三分之一粮食的农民将迎来人工智能革命
item.description:
在马拉维进行的首次测试中，一款人工智能应用程序正在帮助农民治疗猪病，并杀死破坏庄稼的象鼻虫

。【原文：

In its first test in Malawi, an AI app is helping farmers treat pigs and kill weevils that are destroying their crops

】

item.title: 日元下跌，债券期货上涨，原因是日本央行推迟公布购债细节
item.description: 在日本央行表示将减少购债，但推迟到下次政策会议才提供细节之后，日元走软，日本主权债券期货大涨。【原文：The yen weakened and Japanese sovereign bond futures surged after the central bank said it would reduce debt purchases but delayed providing details until its next policy meeting.】

item.title: 日本央行在利率保持稳定的正常化步骤中削减债券购买量
item.description: 日本央行维持基准利率稳定，并表示将在 7 月会议后减少债券购买量，这标志着向政策正常化迈出了关键一步。【原文：The Bank of Japan kept its benchmark interest rate steady and said it will reduce the amount of its bond purchases after its July meeting, marking a key step toward policy normalization.】

item.title: 斯堪尼亚提高电动卡车产量，Northvolt 解决延误问题
item.description: 瑞典卡车制造商斯堪尼亚商用车公司（Scania CV AB）正在加紧生产电动钻机，因为之前推迟的 Northvolt AB 公司的电池已经开始大量运抵其位于索德尔塔列（Sodertalje）的工厂。【原文：Swedish truck maker Scania CV AB is ramping up production of electric rigs now that previously delayed batteries from Northvolt AB have begun arriving in greater numbers at its factory in Sodertalje.】

item.title: 印度市场快讯：阿达尼扩大水泥业务
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets.】

item.title: 美国向马来西亚归还 1MDB 1.56 亿美元挪用资金
item.description: 在东南亚国家向美国当局寻求额外赔偿一个月后，美国司法部表示已向马来西亚返还 1MDB 被挪用的 1.56 亿美元资金。【原文：The US Justice Department said it returned an additional $156 million in misappropriated 1MDB funds to Malaysia, a month after the Southeast Asian nation sought extra compensation from US authorities.】

item.title: MUFG 的经纪业务面临失去更多债券承销业务的风险
item.description: 三菱日联金融集团公司（Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc.）与摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的投资银行合资企业面临失去更多债券承销交易的风险，因为金融监管机构可能会考虑对该部门共享客户公司非公开信息的行为进行处罚。【原文：Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc.’s investment banking venture with Morgan Stanley is at risk of losing more bond underwriting deals as the financial regulators may consider penalizing the unit for sharing non-public information on client companies.】

item.title: 日本零售商永旺放弃 MUFG 经纪公司的债券承销业务
item.description: Aeon Co.称，该公司放弃了三菱日联摩根士丹利证券公司（Mitsubishi UFJ Morgan Stanley Securities Co.【原文：Aeon Co. said it dropped Mitsubishi UFJ Morgan Stanley Securities Co. from arranging a planned bond sale as the underwriter was reported to be facing potential penalties for sharing client information.】

item.title: 中国 50 年期特别债券销售预计将吸引强劲需求
item.description: 对中国债券的狂热丝毫没有减退的迹象，预计中国最长期限的特别国债将以接近历史最低收益率的价格拍卖。【原文：The frenzy for Chinese bonds is showing no signs of fading, with the nation’s longest-dated special government notes expected to be auctioned near-record low yields.】

item.title: 中国炼油企业在经历了几十年的增长后正在减速
item.description: 中国长达数十年之久的石油加工热潮今年可能会衰退，这对全球需求和欧佩克+产油国寻求恢复市场供应的愿望都是一个打击。【原文：China’s decades-long boom in oil processing could falter this year in a blow to global demand and the aspirations of OPEC+ producers seeking to return supply to the market.】

item.title: 今年亚洲消费者对黄金的需求将持续强劲
item.description: 由于地缘政治和宏观经济的不确定性，亚洲黄金零售买家仍然热衷于购买更多的贵金属，即使价格徘徊在高位。【原文：Asian retail gold buyers are still keen to purchase more of the precious metal even as prices hover at elevated levels, with geopolitical and macroeconomic uncertainties driving their interest.】

item.title: 澳大利亚第二养老金预测美联储能控制经济软着陆
item.description: 澳大利亚第二大养老基金--澳大利亚退休信托基金（Australian Retirement Trust）押注美联储能够为美国经济活动放缓创造条件。【原文：Australia’s second-largest pension fund, Australian Retirement Trust, is betting the Federal Reserve can support the conditions for a softening of US economic activity.】

item.title: 瑞银基金经理看好中国垃圾债，但对印度持怀疑态度
item.description: 瑞银资产管理公司（UBS Asset Management）的沙梅拉-汗（Shamaila Khan）在债券投资方面采取了一种有点反直觉的策略。【原文：Shamaila Khan at UBS Asset Management has deployed a somewhat counterintuitive strategy for bond investments.】

item.title: 外国首席执行官对在华业务略有信心
item.description: 今年上半年，在华外国高层管理人员对中国大陆的信心略有增强，尽管对经济的担忧和地缘政治紧张局势的加剧迫使许多人重新评估他们在中国的存在。【原文：Top foreign executives in China grew marginally more confident in the mainland during the first half of the year, even as concerns over the economy and rising geopolitical tensions forced many to reassess their presence.】

item.title: 石油周涨势因风险厌恶情绪戛然而止
item.description: 由于更广泛的金融市场出现风险厌恶情绪，以及有更多迹象表明全球供应强劲，石油在亚洲下跌。【原文：Oil declined in Asia on a risk-off tone in wider financial markets and more signs of robust global supply.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。日本央行准备做出政策决定，苹果公司重登榜首，现金达到万亿美元的里程碑。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. The Bank of Japan prepares to deliver a policy decision, Apple regains its top spot and cash reaches a trillion-dollar milestone. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Kristine Aquino】

item.title: 中国降息呼声高涨，考验捍卫人民币的决心
item.description: 要求中国央行降息的呼声越来越高，中国政府面临着一个选择：是帮助出现不均衡复苏迹象的经济，还是防止本国货币出现更大幅度的下跌。【原文：Voices calling for a rate cut by China’s central bank are getting louder, and Beijing faces a choice in helping an economy that’s showing signs of an uneven recovery or preventing an even steeper drop in its currency.】

item.title: 油田服务公司 HMH 选择摩根大通、派珀和 Evercore 进行 IPO
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，两家行业巨头的合资油田服务公司 HMH Holding Inc.【原文：HMH Holding Inc., an oil field services joint venture between two sector giants, has selected banks for a planned US initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国和印度股市因政策提振希望而受到坊间青睐
item.description: abrdn Plc 在未来三到六个月内更看好中国和印度的股票，而不是日本的同类股票，因为他们认为正确的政策措施将有助于这两个新兴市场吸引资金流入。【原文：abrdn Plc prefers Chinese and Indian stocks over their Japanese peers in the next three to six months, betting that the right policy moves would help the two emerging markets lure fund inflows.】

item.title: 亚洲股市将下跌，日元在日本央行会议前保持稳定：市场综述
item.description: 周五早盘，亚洲股市有望下跌，原因是人工智能相关公司以外的美股涨势停滞。在日本央行做出政策决定之前，日元持稳。【原文：Stocks in Asia are poised to fall in early Friday trading as a rally in US shares outside of AI-related names stalled. The yen was steady ahead of a Bank of Japan policy decision.】

item.title: 为什么委内瑞拉的选举这次可能真的很重要？
item.description: 委内瑞拉的选举几乎不值得信任，这也是为什么 7 月 28 日的投票令人关注的原因。尼古拉斯-马杜罗（Nicolás Maduro）自2013年接替已故导师和前任乌戈-查韦斯（Hugo Chávez）以来，一直牢牢掌控着委内瑞拉总统的大权。最近，马杜罗清洗了自己的核心圈子，以某种方式设法稳定了摇摇欲坠的委内瑞拉经济，现在似乎愿意在公开投票中放手一搏。【原文：There’s little to trust about Venezuelan elections, which is why the vote on July 28 has become an interesting one. Nicolás Maduro has had a firm grip on the country’s presidency since 2013, when he succeeded his late mentor and predecessor, Hugo Chávez. Of late, Maduro has purged his inner circle, somehow managed to stabilize a shaky Venezuelan economy, and now seems willing to take his chances with an open vote.】

item.title: 受人工智能数据中心需求影响，傲视全球的房地产投资信托基金涨势或将延续
item.description: 看好澳大利亚嘉民集团（Goodman Group）的投资者押注，随着其优越的地理位置和充足的资金继续助推其利润丰厚的人工智能数据中心业务的发展，该公司击败同行的涨势还将继续。【原文：Bullish investors are betting the peer-beating rally in Australia’s Goodman Group has further to run as its prime locations and ample financial resources continue to fuel its lucrative push into data centers for artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 瑞银认为企业债券利差将在年底小幅扩大
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）的策略师表示，到今年年底，美国企业债券利差可能会从目前的水平小幅扩大，但总体而言，债券需求强劲，企业业绩良好。【原文：US corporate bond spreads may widen modestly from current levels by the end of the year, but generally demand for the bonds is strong and companies are performing well, according to strategists at UBS Group AG.】

item.title: 咆哮的凯蒂猫 "似乎已退出 GameStop 看涨期权
item.description: 基思-吉尔（Keith Gill —）是一位在网上被称为 "咆哮的凯蒂猫"（Roaring Kitty —）的股票投资者，他声称已经退出了他在 GameStop 公司的全部期权头寸，同时还增持了大量股票。【原文：Keith Gill — the meme-stock investor known online as “Roaring Kitty” — purports to have exited his entire options position in GameStop Corp. while adding to his heap of shares.】

item.title: 米莱希望在至关重要的 IMF 会议上继续连胜
item.description: 哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）总统将于周五与国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）总裁会面，自这位自由主义经济学家六个月前在阿根廷掌权以来，他取得了一系列最成功的胜利，这让他信心倍增。【原文：President Javier Milei will walk into a meeting with the head of the International Monetary Fund on Friday emboldened by the most successful series of wins since the libertarian economist took power in Argentina six months ago.】

item.title: 房地产投资信托基金打破常规玩法，Blackstone 选择给交易增加甜头
item.description: 当 Blackstone Inc. 将一个学生宿舍投资组合出售时，它在幕后努力使这笔交易更具吸引力。【原文：When Blackstone Inc. put a portfolio of student dorms up for sale, it worked behind the scenes to make the deal even more attractive.】

item.title: 魁北克养老金合资公司押注美国公寓和学生公寓
item.description: 魁北克公共养老金管理公司和商业地产公司 Walker & Dunlop Investment Partners 预计将把近三年前成立的合资企业的规模扩大一倍，以投资美国住房。【原文：Quebec’s public pension manager and commercial real estate firm Walker & Dunlop Investment Partners expect to double the size of a joint venture they started nearly three years ago to invest in US housing.】

item.title: Fiera 首席执行官称加拿大央行有通往 3% 利率的明确道路
item.description: 加拿大最大的资产管理公司之一的负责人表示，加拿大央行在明年年底前将政策利率下调至 3% 左右的 "条件已经成熟"。【原文：The head of one of Canada’s biggest asset managers says “the conditions are right” for the Bank of Canada to cut its policy interest rate to around 3% by the end of next year.】

item.title: 阿根廷月通胀率降至 2022 年以来最低水平
item.description: 阿根廷的月度通胀率在 5 月份放缓至 2022 年初以来的最低水平，在哈维尔-米莱总统的领导下实现了连续第五次降温，但市场对这一趋势能否持续仍存疑虑。【原文：Monthly inflation in Argentina slowed to its lowest level in May since early 2022, capping the fifth straight cooler print under President Javier Milei as market doubts linger that the trend can be sustained.】
